participant_2.background:
I just moved into an apartment within the vicinity of my new job.
I just graduated college with my bachelor s degree in education.
I love children.
I just accepted a job at the elementary school in my hometown.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for fun?
I love working with children. I just graduated from college with a Bachelor's degree in Education and I just accepted a job at an elementary school in my hometown.
Wow, that's so great! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher. I love children too. I've always wanted to be a chef, but I didn't pass the audition for a cooking show recently.
Oh, that's too bad. But don't give up on your dream! I'm sure you'll get another chance.
Thanks! I'm definitely going to keep trying. In the meantime, I'll just keep practicing my cooking skills.
That's a great idea! And maybe you could volunteer at a local soup kitchen or homeless shelter to get some experience working with food.
That's a great idea! I'll look into that. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
So, what are you looking forward to the most in your new job?
I'm really looking forward to meeting my new students and helping them learn. I'm also looking forward to getting involved in the community and making a difference in the lives of children.
That's so great! I'm sure you're going to be a great teacher.
Thanks! I'm excited to get started.
Well, I'm sure I'm going to be seeing you around town soon.
It was nice talking to you.
